verses.name: Romans 8:25
verses.text: But if we hope for that we see not, then do we with patience wait for it.

verses.name: Romans 8:26
verses.text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities: for we know not what we should pray for as we ought: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.

verses.name: Romans 8:27
verses.text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit, because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God.
